package.description:
Stable Estimator of Dynamical Systems (SEDS) This package provides realtime, robust, and reactive controller to perform reaching movement. For more information about SEDS refer to the following paper:
S.M. Khansari-Zadeh and A. Billar, "Learning Stable Non-Linear Dynamical Systems with Gaussian Mixture Models", IEEE Trans. on Robotics, 2011.
Please acknowledge the authors by citing the paper above in any academic and non-academic publication that have made use of this code or part of it.
package.author: Mohammad Khansari
